hero.title: We build apps that people actually want to use
hero.description1: Team of developers who wanted to create more than just a great software. Now we create web apps, mobile apps, and websites that solve real problems for real people.
hero.description2: No corporate bullshit, no endless meetings, no "synergy" talks. Just clean code, honest communication, and products that work.

webApps.title: Web Applications
webApps.description: Custom web apps that actually work. We handle user accounts, payments, databases, and all the boring stuff so your business can run smoothly. Think Netflix, but for your specific needs.

websites.title: Website Development
websites.description: Professional websites that look good and load fast. From simple business sites to complex e-commerce platforms. We write clean code and make sure everything works on all devices.

mobileApps.title: Mobile Apps
mobileApps.description: iPhone and Android apps that don't suck. We usually build one app that works on both platforms because it's faster and cheaper. Your customers won't know the difference.

dontDo.title: What we DON'T do:
dontDo.description: WordPress sites, logo design, SEO consulting, or crypto stuff. We're developers, not marketers or designers (though we can make things look decent).

howWeWork.title: How we work
howWeWork.description1: We're based in Pilsen but work remotely most of the time. Weekly check-ins instead of daily standups. We write tests, use version control, and deploy responsibly.
howWeWork.description2: We're available on Slack during business hours and respond to emails quickly. No bullshit, just good communication and reliable delivery.

simple.title: Simple Web App
simple.description: Basic web application with user accounts, database, and core features. 2-4 months.

mobile.title: Mobile App
mobile.description: iOS and Android app with backend. App Store submission included. 3-6 months.

complex.title: Complex System
complex.description: Enterprise-level applications with integrations, advanced features. 6+ months.

goodFit.title: ✓ You're a good fit if:
items: You know what you want to build
Your budget is $15k+ (we're not cheap, but we're worth it)
You want honest feedback, not just "yes sir"
You understand good software takes time

badFit.title: ✗ Probably not a good fit if:
items: You want to control every tiny detail
You're shopping for the cheapest option

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.response: We'll get back to you within 2 business days with a straight answer.
